title: Season 7 is so cool
body: So who else is enjoying seeing 3 exhausts on the enemy team every single game? I definitely love a summoner spell for people too garbage to outplay you properly

replies.body: Exhaust has always been broken, arguably the same if not for than flash, but because up until recently people saw it as a support only spell, now they know (slightly) better it is more popular, especially on (the smart) yasuo players, as they have realised after the extensive unjust (more to come) nerf from clueless people complaining the only way to survive with him is to take exhaust, that's why the ignite faction of yasuo's are near dead and its either tp or exhaust now. Exhaust has finally been shone in the light and people have realised how strong it actually is.
